decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Acoustic Fan Jackets, Attenuators, Compact Power Plus, Katercarb, DP/2375/AP/01, DP/2375/AP/02, DP/2375/AP/03, DP/2375/AP/04, DP/2375/AP/05, DP/2375/AP/06 Received: 15 August 2014 
DP/2375/AP Received: 20 August 2014 Technical Report No: SA 4173-ENV-1A Received: 05 September 2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The level of noise emitted from the site shall not exceed 10dB below background noise level in accordance with BS4142 as measured from the nearest noise sensitive location.
description: Installation of a kitchen flue at the rear of the building
